data.eml:eml: Descriptions of six new species of Midoria (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Ledrinae) from China with a key to the species of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Yu-Jian, Li, Zi-Zhong (2011): Descriptions of six new species of Midoria (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Ledrinae) from China with a key to the species of the genus. Zootaxa 2897: 57-63, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.207765
